name: Quantum Sudoku
description:
This project owes it's current look and inspiration to the youtube video 'Superpositions, Sudoku, the Wave Function Collapse algorithm.' by MartinDonald.
(Video here)

In this game you are trying to solve Sudoku, but with the added rule that each puzzle will have more than one possible solution. You collapse the superposition of the puzzles by choosing each square's value from the available possibilities. Sudoku rules still apply though and careless collapsing will fail the puzzle. 

Currently one puzzle per day. More to come later, including an actual art style instead of just cribbing from Martin Donald.
